item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Monday, September 30, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. On leaving my last job (leaving Apple) (38 points | 7 comments)
2. Building a robust frontend using progressive enhancement (67 points | 10 comments)
3. Don’t believe the hype: AGI is far from inevitable (28 points | 14 comments)
4. Prep: Golang comptime. Pure blasphemy (19 points | 7 comments)
5. The Public Domain Problem (22 points | 14 comments)
6. Notes on the Crystal language (47 points | 18 comments)
7. Using undocumented Apple AI/ML instructions to get the average color of an image (4 points | no comments)
8. We Have a Package for You! A Comprehensive Analysis of Package Hallucinations by Code Generating LLMs (4 points | no comments)
9. Varlink Now (4 points | 4 comments)
10. secure.py – Simplify HTTP Security Headers for Python Web Apps (Major Update) (1 points | 1 comment)
11. Use of Prolog for developing a new programming language (1992) (7 points | 1 comment)
12. Build a serverless ACID database with this one neat trick (atomic PutIfAbsent) (7 points | no comments)
13. Type-erased generic functions for C: A modest non-proposal (6 points | no comments)
14. Brackets are awesome, don’t use them (16 points | 21 comments)
15. How 1 Software Engineer Outperforms 138 - Lichess Case Study (1 points | no comments)
16. go-sqlite3: Go bindings to SQLite using wazero (2 points | no comments)
17. Renderling Devlog, Implementing Frustum Culling using Rust-GPU (2 points | no comments)
18. Gentle intro to type-level recursion in Rust (2017) (1 points | no comments)
19. Sitina1 Open-source Camera (34 points | 1 comment)
20. Any interesting tech blogs outside the usual software/web dev circle? (3 points | 2 comments)
21. bpfsnake: snake in bpftrace (6 points | no comments)
22. All Systems Go! 2024 (14 points | no comments)
23. What brings an upgrade to GCC 14 from GCC 13? (3 points | 1 comment)
24. Overbooking - how providers divide up the bandwidth (4 points | 3 comments)
25. Arch Linux and Valve Collaboration (129 points | 28 comments)
